name: A Sticky Matter
description: A youtuber named Dungeon lord has always searched for The Big Thing nobody did before. He told himself everybody's on vacation and shares videos of sun kissed places, why shouldn't I mention the places beneath the surface? He finds a way into the sewers and challenges himself: how long can I survive with only one stick? The stick works as a torch through the different levels, and gets shorter the longer its flame burns. So you have to be as fast as you can, because without the flame you won't see anything.
